detailHtml:
Stop letting a dead phone make you anxious

A dead battery isn’t “an inconvenience.” It blocks doors, payments, and decisions when stakes are highest. Don’t learn it the hard way.

  • Stranded in a city you barely know — your phone dies as the last bus pulls away.
  • Right before a first date, your phone goes dark — they walk off convinced you never showed.
  • Mid‑selloff, your phone shuts down — your portfolio free‑falls and you can’t act.

Three frustrations solved in one snap

  • Magnetic snap‑on alignment — clicks into place and stays locked.
  • Real fast charging — 20W PD pumps 60% battery in 30 minutes.
  • Stable stand function — hands‑free video, calls, and streaming in portrait or landscape.

Carry less. Set it down. Get more done.

  • Ultra‑slim, featherlight body — disappears in your pocket or sling.
  • Stable stand function — hands‑free calls, streaming, and meetings.
  • Portrait or landscape — steady angles that don’t wobble.

Specs that keep up all day

A'DAR NordCharge snaps on magnetically and powers you through the longest days. With a magnetic snap and stable stand function, it is always ready for use — whether on the go, at your desk, or on your nightstand. Everything you need to know, at a glance:

  • 10,000 mAh high‑density cell • 20W USB‑C in/out • 15W wireless • pass‑through charging
  • MagSafe‑compatible magnetic ring with 18 rare‑earth magnets
  • LED power display with smart temperature regulation
  • In the box: A'DAR NordCharge power bank, USB‑C fast cable, magnetic ring, quick-start guide

Confidence guarantees that remove hesitation

  • 24/7 concierge support — talk to a real expert in 30 seconds.
  • Unlimited replacements for 10 years — instant swap, no questions asked.
  • Payment security — PCI compliance and real‑time encryption.

“The only pocket‑sized magnetic charger that passed 16 international safety certifications.” — TechGear Review Lab

faq.question: Q1. Does NordCharge work with Android phones?
faq.answer: Yes. The built-in USB-C port fast charges Android phones, tablets, earbuds, and more. The included magnetic ring lets any case snap on securely.

faq.question: Q2. Can I bring it on flights?
faq.answer: Absolutely. 10,000 mAh is within the International Civil Aviation Organization guidelines for carry-on batteries.

faq.question: Q3. Will it overheat while charging?
faq.answer: NordCharge monitors temperature with 12 layers of protection and automatically balances output, so it stays cool even during marathon charging sessions.

faq.question: Q4. Can I charge my phone and the power bank simultaneously?
faq.answer: Yes. Plug NordCharge into the wall and it will recharge itself while powering your phone via wireless or USB-C pass-through charging.
